constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_users_lastnick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (lastnick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_users_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_clientes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codcliente) REFERENCES clientes (codcliente) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_tour_reservas_estados
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idestado) REFERENCES tour_reservas_estados (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_tour_reservas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idreserva) REFERENCES tour_reservas (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_tour_albaranescli
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idalbaran) REFERENCES albaranescli (idalbaran) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
